div.p: The histologic type codes can be taken either from ICD-O-3 morphology codes (including behavior suffix) or SNOMED CT neoplasm morphology codes. For primary cancers, the ICD-O-3 behavior suffix should be /1, /2, or /3. For secondary cancers, the ICD-O-3 behavior suffix should be /6 or /9. The ICD-O-3 codes are not included here due to intellectual property restrictions, but the value set binding is extensible, so ICD-O-3 codes conform to mCODE requirements.
